metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15020 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: dwarf1.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, mishandles pointers, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted ELF file, related to parse_die and parse_line_table, as demonstrated by a parse_die heap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
